name: Scenario_PreAlpha_Minefield_A
journelText:
My plan worked perfectly.  I lured my brainless foes into the minefield and was rewarded as they preceded to blunder into every single mine. Though there were no mines left by the end I could still cackle with glee at the results of my tactical masterstroke. Afterward I took a moment to siphon what dark energy I could from the gentle shower of limps raining down around us before we turned away and headed onwards. 
 .[BUTTON](EXIT){Move On Boyo} [EFFECT](ADD_ENERGY){50}
